title: Dubai Gold
imgSmText: A heist crew targets a gold exchange during a sandstorm in Dubai.
imgText: A meticulous crew uses a historic sandstorm as cover to rob a high-security Dubai gold vault, but a relentless Interpol agent is waiting for them inside.

title: Tel Aviv Noir
imgSmText: A detective hunts a serial killer using the city's dating app data.
imgText: A jaded Tel Aviv police detective discovers a pattern linking a series of murders to a popular dating app, forcing her to go undercover in the digital dating world.

title: Dhaka Takedown
imgSmText: A rickshaw driver becomes an unlikely informant for a drug bust.
imgText: A desperate rickshaw driver in Dhaka agrees to inform on a powerful narcotics ring for the police, plunging his family into a dangerous world of corruption and violence.

title: The New Zealand Job
imgSmText: Outlaws hunt for lost gold in 1930s New Zealand's South Island.
imgText: During the Great Depression, a notorious Australian gang crosses the Tasman to find a fabled gold shipment lost in the harsh Southern Alps, pursued by a determined constable.

title: Island of Lies
imgSmText: A hippie commune in the Philippines hides a dark secret.
imgText: A woman joins her sister's idyllic commune on a remote Philippine island, only to discover the group is a front for a sophisticated international smuggling operation.

title: Murder at 40,000 Feet
imgSmText: An air marshal must find a killer on a locked-door international flight.
imgText: When a billionaire is murdered mid-flight and the plane is locked down, an air marshal has only a few hours to interrogate the first-class passengers and find the killer.

title: Champagne Vengeance
imgSmText: Grape pickers conspire to rob the exploitative vineyard owner.
imgText: Tired of being cheated, the seasonal workers at a prestigious Champagne house plan an elaborate heist to steal the vintage of the century from their cruel patron.

title: The Eswatini Exchange
imgSmText: A wildlife ranger uncovers a rhino horn smuggling ring.
imgText: A dedicated ranger in a Swazi nature reserve discovers his own colleagues are involved in a brutal poaching syndicate, forcing him to risk everything for justice.

title: Santiago Siege
imgSmText: A retired detective is pulled back in during a city-wide bank robbery.
imgText: A massive, coordinated robbery hits multiple banks in downtown Santiago. The only person who understands the pattern is the retired detective who put the mastermind away years ago.

title: The Monaco Mark
imgSmText: A con artist targets the super-yacht crowd in the South of France.
imgText: A charming grifter works the elite circuit of Monaco, but when he scams the wrong Russian oligarch, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat and mouse on the Riviera.

title: The Glasgow Code
imgSmText: A hacker in Glasgow accidentally accesses a human trafficking network.
imgText: A freelance cyber-security expert in Glasgow stumbles upon a encrypted network used by traffickers. She must outsmart them digitally while staying alive in the real world.

title: The Mumbai Connection
imgSmText: A washed-up boxer becomes a courier for a Mumbai crime lord.
imgText: To pay for his sister's surgery, a boxer becomes a bagman for a Mumbai gangster. He soon realizes he's carrying more than money, making him a target for rival gangs.

title: The Reykjavik Run
imgSmText: A courier smuggles contraband through Iceland's frozen landscapes.
imgText: A disgraced ex-soldier becomes a high-stakes courier on the Iceland route. Her latest package is so valuable that every criminal from Europe wants to intercept it.

title: The Lisbon Lift
imgSmText: A crew of pickpockets targets tourists on Lisbon's historic trams.
imgText: An aging master thief teaches his young crew how to expertly pickpockets on Lisbon's trams, but their biggest score puts them in the crosshairs of a vicious gang.

title: The Bogota Betrayal
imgSmText: A DEA agent's informant is his long-lost brother.
imgText: A DEA agent is sent to Bogota to bring down a new cartel, only to discover his key informant is the brother he thought was dead for ten years.

title: Casablanca Cut
imgSmText: A pickpocket steals a phone containing evidence against a powerful official.
imgText: A skilled Casablanca thief unknowingly steals a corrupt minister's burner phone, which holds proof of murder. Now hunted by police and killers, he must expose the truth.

title: Algiers Angle
imgSmText: An Interpol agent goes undercover to break a European car smuggling ring.
imgText: A by-the-book agent infiltrates a sophisticated network that steals luxury cars in Europe and ships them from Algeria. She must betray her new allies to bring them down.

title: Sinaloa Shadow
imgSmText: A cartel accountant tries to quit, but his boss won't let him go.
imgText: The money man for a ruthless drug lord decides he wants out to save his family. The cartel, however, considers him too valuable and knows too much to ever let him leave.

title: The Dragon's Trail
imgSmText: A monk investigates a sacred artifact theft from a remote Bhutanese monastery.
imgText: When a revered religious statue is stolen, a young monk with a knack for observation must leave his spiritual seclusion and navigate the capital city's underworld to find it.

title: Mumbai Black
imgSmText: A washed-up cop hunts an organ trafficking ring in the city's underbelly.
imgText: A disgraced police inspector gets one last chance: find the source of a new organ trafficking ring preying on the city's slums, forcing him to confront his own corruption.

title: Bangalore Blue
imgSmText: A tech CEO's murder reveals a corporate espionage war over a new chip.
imgText: The founder of India's leading tech firm is found dead. His daughter must decode his secret files to uncover a ruthless conspiracy between rival companies and foreign agents.

title: Cipher
imgSmText: A reclusive female hacker in Oslo is framed for assassinating a politician.
imgText: When a politician is killed by a manipulated self-driving car, the code traces back to Norway's most infamous hacker. She must clear her name by finding the real culprit.

title: The Florist
imgSmText: A Copenhagen detective finds all clues point to her lover in a florist's murder.
imgText: A meticulous detective investigates the brutal murder of a popular florist. The evidence begins to point uncomfortably close to her own home and the man she loves.

title: Persian Poison
imgSmText: In ancient Persia, a royal vizier investigates the king's mysterious death.
imgText: The Shah's sudden death is called natural, but his trusted advisor suspects poison. He must navigate a web of harem intrigue, rival princes, and foreign spies to find the killer.

title: The Limehouse Golem
imgSmText: A dark Victorian thriller about a hunt for a serial killer in London.
imgText: In 1880s Limehouse, a police inspector investigates a series of gruesome murders the press has dubbed the work of the Golem, with the prime suspect being a music hall star.

title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Labradors
imgSmText: A heist to steal a prized show dog goes hilariously wrong.
imgText: A group of hopeless small-time crooks plan the perfect kidnapping of a championship dog for ransom. Everything that can go wrong does, in the most British way possible.

title: The Amsterdam Drop
imgSmText: A courier smuggling diamonds must outrun both gangs and police.
imgText: A diamond courier working for a crime syndicate is given a final, high-stakes drop. When he's double-crossed, he must use his knowledge of the city to survive and get revenge.

title: The Belgrade Connection
imgSmText: A war crimes investigator is targeted after uncovering a mass grave.
imgText: A tenacious investigator in Serbia uncovers a mass grave from the Balkan wars, implicating a powerful politician. She becomes the target of a deadly cover-up operation.

title: The Long Con
imgSmText: Partners in crime stage an elaborate scam on a Miami art dealer.
imgText: Two master grifters pose as wealthy art collectors to con a ruthless dealer out of millions. Their perfect plan is threatened by greed and an unexpected spark of real emotion.

title: Gone Fishing
imgSmText: A retired detective in a Scottish village investigates a local's disappearance.
imgText: A retired Glasgow detective's fishing holiday is interrupted when a local man vanishes. He finds himself drawn into a quiet village's web of secrets, grudges, and lies.
